info.name: Nginx version detect
author: philippedelteil
daffainfo
info.description: Some nginx servers have the version on the response header. Useful when you need to find specific CVEs on your targets.

curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_9_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/35.0.1916.47 Safari/537.36' 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/'

curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_9_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/35.0.1916.47 Safari/537.36' 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/'

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: testphp.vulnweb.com' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2226.0 Safari/537.36' 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/'

info.name: Public .idea Folder containing files with sensitive data
author: martincodes-de
info.description: Searches for .idea Folder by querying the /.idea and a few other files with sensitive data.

curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2225.0 Safari/537.36' 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/.idea/workspace.xml'
